title: Mobile Microlearning Design for Open Data Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Application in the language domain (linked to report/presentation document writing competencies)

learning_goals: Learners can search for publicly available data and evaluate credible sources to solve real-world business problems.
Learners can construct data-driven storytelling to apply analytical results to business decision-making.
Learners can use mobile tools to create data visualization outputs and share them with peers.

resources: Data Analysis Template (e.g., Google Data Studio)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
